description: This file defines the main application component for a React-based web application, handling routing, modal dialogs, and rendering core components like DeviceTable, DeviceDetails, and DeviceForm.

methods.name: goHome
methods.description: Navigates the router to the home path '/'

methods.name: openAdd
methods.description: Opens the modal form for adding a new device

methods.name: openEdit
methods.description: Opens the modal form for editing an existing device

methods.name: onFormSuccess
methods.description: Handles successful form submission, closing the modal
